mapper.select: SELECT J.*,R.STAR,R.R_COUNT,NVL2(W.ID,'Y','N') WASH, L.w_count FROM LECTURE J LEFT JOIN (SELECT LT_NO ,ROUND(AVG(STAR)) STAR, COUNT(*) R_COUNT FROM REVIEW GROUP BY LT_NO) R ON J.LT_NO = R.LT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM WISHLIST WHERE ID = #{id}) W ON J.LT_NO = W.LT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT lt_no, count(lt_no) w_count from WISHLIST group by lt_no) L ON J.LT_NO = L.LT_NO WHERE J.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' AND TRUNC(EXP_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND J.UP_CTGR = #{upCtgr} AND J.DOWN_CTGR = #{downCtgr} ORDER BY J.LT_NO DESC
SELECT C.* , U.NAME UP_NAME FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID WHERE C.UP_CTGR = #{upCtgr} ORDER BY C.CTGR_ID
SELECT C.* , U.NAME UP_NAME FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID WHERE C.CTGR_ID = #{downCtgr}

WITH LECT_DETA AS( SELECT L.* ,U.name,U.cre_intro,U.PHT,NVL2(W.ID,'Y','N') WASH, C.w_count FROM LECTURE L JOIN USERS U ON L.CRE_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM WISHLIST WHERE ID = #{id}) W ON L.LT_NO = W.LT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT lt_no, count(lt_no) w_count from WISHLIST group by lt_no) C ON L.LT_NO = C.LT_NO WHERE L.LT_NO = #{ltNo}) SELECT L.*,NVL2(S.TLSN_NO,'Y','N') MY_SUGANG FROM LECT_DETA L LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SUGANG WHERE ID = #{id} AND TLSN_ST_CODE = 'SU01' AND TRUNC(EXP_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)) S ON L.LT_NO = S.LT_NO
SELECT R.*,U.NAME,U.PHT ,CASE R.WRITER WHEN #{id} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END MY_REVIEW FROM REVIEW R JOIN USERS U ON R.WRITER = U.ID WHERE R.LT_NO = #{ltNo} ORDER BY R.RV_NO DESC
SELECT Q.*, U.NAME ,CASE Q.WRITER WHEN #{id} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END MY_QNA FROM LT_QNA Q JOIN USERS U ON Q.WRITER = U.ID WHERE Q.LT_NO = #{ltNo} ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC
SELECT N.* ,D.FILE_PATH ,D.PHY_PATH ,D.DETA_NO FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN DETA_FILE D ON N.FILE_NO = D.FILE_NO WHERE LT_NO = #{ltNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT U.ID CRE_ID, U.NAME, U.CRE_INTRO, L.LT_ST_CODE, #{id} id FROM USERS U JOIN LECTURE L ON U.ID = L.CRE_ID WHERE U.ID = #{creId}) PIVOT ( COUNT(*) FOR LT_ST_CODE IN('L01' OPEN_COUNT,'L03' CLOSE_COUNT,'L04' REPORT_COUNT) )

WITH LEC_DETA AS( SELECT J.*,R.STAR,R.R_COUNT,NVL2(W.ID,'Y','N') WASH, l.w_count FROM LECTURE J LEFT JOIN (SELECT LT_NO ,ROUND(AVG(STAR)) STAR, COUNT(*) R_COUNT FROM REVIEW GROUP BY LT_NO) R ON J.LT_NO = R.LT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM WISHLIST WHERE ID = #{id}) W ON J.LT_NO = W.LT_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT lt_no, count(lt_no) w_count from WISHLIST group by lt_no) L ON J.LT_NO = L.LT_NO WHERE J.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' AND TRUNC(J.EXP_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND J.CRE_ID = #{creId} ORDER BY J.LT_NO) SELECT L.LT_NO,L.TTL,L.THUMB,L.PRC,L.KIT_PRC,L.STAR,L.R_COUNT,L.WASH,L.w_count,C.NAME DOWN_CTGR, C.UP_NAME UP_CTGR FROM LEC_DETA L JOIN (SELECT C.* , U.NAME UP_NAME FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID) C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S.COUNT DESC) RANK ,S.LT_NO ,L.TTL, L.THUMB,C.UP_CTGR,C.DOWN_CTGR,R.R_COUNT,R.STAR FROM (SELECT LT_NO , COUNT(LT_NO) COUNT FROM SUGANG WHERE REG_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE -1 GROUP BY LT_NO) S JOIN LECTURE L ON S.LT_NO = L.LT_NO JOIN (SELECT C.CTGR_ID,C.NAME DOWN_CTGR, U.NAME UP_CTGR FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID) C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT LT_NO, COUNT(LT_NO) R_COUNT, ROUND(AVG(STAR)) STAR FROM REVIEW GROUP BY LT_NO) R ON R.LT_NO = L.LT_NO WHERE L.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' AND TRUNC(L.EXP_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)) WHERE RANK < 7

SELECT UP_CTGR FROM ( SELECT RANK()OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(L.UP_CTGR) DESC) RANK,L.UP_CTGR FROM SUGANG S JOIN LECTURE L ON S.LT_NO = L.LT_NO
WHERE TO_CHAR(S.REG_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') - 7, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') - 1, 'YYYYMMDD')
WHERE TO_CHAR(S.REG_DATE,'YYYY/MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYY/MM')
GROUP BY L.UP_CTGR) WHERE RANK = 1

SELECT L.lt_no ,L.TTL, L.THUMB,L.UP_CTGR CTGR_ID,C.UP_CTGR,C.DOWN_CTGR,R.R_COUNT,R.STAR FROM LECTURE L JOIN (SELECT C.CTGR_ID,C.NAME DOWN_CTGR, U.NAME UP_CTGR FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID) C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT LT_NO, COUNT(LT_NO) R_COUNT, ROUND(AVG(STAR)) STAR FROM REVIEW GROUP BY LT_NO) R ON R.LT_NO = L.LT_NO WHERE L.UP_CTGR = #{upCtgr} AND L.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' AND TRUNC(L.EXP_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT lt_no , TTL, THUMB ,UP_CTGR,DOWN_CTGR,R_COUNT,STAR FROM (SELECT ROWNUM ,L.lt_no ,L.TTL, L.THUMB ,C.UP_CTGR,C.DOWN_CTGR,R.R_COUNT,R.STAR FROM LECTURE L JOIN (SELECT C.CTGR_ID,C.NAME DOWN_CTGR, U.NAME UP_CTGR FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID) C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT LT_NO, COUNT(LT_NO) R_COUNT, ROUND(AVG(STAR)) STAR FROM REVIEW GROUP BY LT_NO) R ON R.LT_NO = L.LT_NO WHERE L.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' AND TRUNC(L.EXP_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY L.START_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 7

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S.COUNT DESC) RANK ,S.LT_NO ,L.TTL, L.THUMB,C.UP_CTGR,C.DOWN_CTGR,R.R_COUNT,R.STAR FROM (SELECT LT_NO , COUNT(LT_NO) COUNT FROM SUGANG
WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE to_char(reg_date, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') - 7, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'iw') - 1, 'YYYYMMDD')
WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY/MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYY/MM')
GROUP BY LT_NO) S JOIN LECTURE L ON S.LT_NO = L.LT_NO JOIN (SELECT C.CTGR_ID,C.NAME DOWN_CTGR, U.NAME UP_CTGR FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID) C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT LT_NO, COUNT(LT_NO) R_COUNT, ROUND(AVG(STAR)) STAR FROM REVIEW GROUP BY LT_NO) R ON R.LT_NO = L.LT_NO WHERE L.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' AND TRUNC(L.EXP_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) WHERE RANK < 3

SELECT * FROM(SELECT L.TTL, L.THUMB,C.UP_CTGR,C.DOWN_CTGR FROM LECTURE L JOIN (SELECT C.CTGR_ID,C.NAME DOWN_CTGR, U.NAME UP_CTGR FROM CTGR C JOIN CTGR U ON C.UP_CTGR = U.CTGR_ID) C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID WHERE L.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' AND TRUNC(L.EXP_DATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY SYS.dbms_random.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM < 4
